parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of the text whose plane rotation matrix to retrieve (see Remarks )

title: IDisplayData.GetTextPlaneAtIndex
description: Gets the rotation matrix of the specified text relative to the X-Y plane of the model.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of the text whose plane rotation matrix to retrieve (see Remarks )

returns: Array of nine doubles of the text plane rotation matrix (see Remarks )
remarks:
Use
IDisplayData::GetTextCount
to specify Index.
The nine values of the returned rotation matrix (coord(
i
)) are ordered differently from other plane APIs. If you need to manipulate the text plane axes as is shown in the Example section, use the following assignments:
X-axis: coord(0), coord(3), coord(6)
Y-axis: coord(1), coord(4), coord(7)
Z-axis: coord(2), coord(5), coord(8)
